name: HELLTOWER (itch)
description:
You are Satan, CEO of Hell. And you need a nice cold drink.

Unfortunately the only vending machine in the fiery afterlife is at the bottom of HELLTOWER, market leader in suffering for all, you included.

There's only 1 way down, but be careful. Your rampage for refreshment can't be good for the building's shaky construction, and it might just start collapsing in on itself as you go down!

Gameplay:

As you descend through the skyscraper, the floors begin to collapse into eachother, their layouts merging together. As this includes enemies, you will have to be thorough with them lest they pile up in a swarm; and in case you get into a tough spot with the walls, you can always punch through them.

The score is judged based on killstreaks - the more enemies you can kill without being hit, the higher it gets.

(Disclaimer: There are some bugs and glitches, however, the game is beatable. Trapdoors may be hidden by corpses in later levels, and there are duplicate false trapdoors in some levels.)

Controls :

WASD to MOVE

LEFT CLICK to SHOOT

Q to THROW WEAPON

E to PLACE BOMB

Programming: KyoZM
Art: Enoshade & faffy
Music/SFX: kalapuikko1
